verses.verse: Sing aloud<WH7442> to God,<WH430> our strength!<WH5797> Make a joyful shout<WH7321> to the God<WH430> of Jacob!<WH3290>
Raise<WH5375> a song,<WH2172> and bring<WH5414> here the tambourine,<WH8596> the pleasant<WH5273> lyre<WH3658> with the harp.<WH5035>
Blow<WH8628> the trumpet<WH7782> at the New Moon,<WH2320> at the full moon,<WH2320> on our feast<WH2282> day.<WH3117>
For it is a statute<WH2706> for Israel,<WH3478> an ordinance<WH4941> of the God<WH430> of Jacob.<WH3290>
He appointed<WH7760> it in Joseph<WH3084> for a testimony,<WH5715> when he went out<WH3318> over the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> I heard<WH8085> a language<WH8193> that I didn't<WH3045> know.
"I removed<WH5493> his shoulder<WH7926> from the burden.<WH5447> His hands<WH3709> were freed<WH5674> from the basket.<WH1731>

You called<WH7121> in trouble,<WH6869> and I delivered<WH2502> you.<WH6030> I answered you in the secret place<WH5643> of thunder.<WH7482> I tested<WH974> you at the waters<WH4325> of Meribah.<WH4809>" Selah.<WH5542>
"Hear,<WH8085> my people,<WH5971> and I will testify<WH5749> to you,<WH3478> Israel, if you would listen to me!<WH8085>
There shall be no strange<WH2114> god<WH410> in you,<WH7812> neither shall you worship any foreign<WH5236> god.<WH410>
I am Yahweh,<WH3068> your God,<WH430> who brought<WH5927> you up out of the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714> Open your mouth<WH6310> wide,<WH7337> and I will fill it.<WH4390>
But my people<WH5971> didn't<WH8085> listen to my voice.<WH6963> Israel<WH3478> desired none of me.<WH14>
So I let them go<WH7971> after the stubbornness<WH8307> of their hearts,<WH3820> that they might walk<WH3212> in their own counsels.<WH4156>
Oh<WH3863> that my people<WH5971> would listen<WH8085> to me,<WH3478> that Israel would walk<WH1980> in my ways!<WH1870>
I would soon<WH4592> subdue<WH3665> their enemies,<WH341> and turn<WH7725> my hand<WH3027> against their adversaries.<WH6862>
The haters<WH8130> of Yahweh<WH3068> would cringe<WH3584> before him,<WH6256> and their punishment would last forever.<WH5769>
But he would have also fed<WH398> them with the finest<WH2459> of the wheat.<WH2406> I will satisfy<WH7646> you with honey<WH1706> out of the rock.<WH6697>"
